svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2020-07-14T14:54:36.905Z" agent="5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/83.0.4103.116 Safari/537.36" etag="1nFzACSbeMa2SNVCNzoX" version="9.1.0" type="google" pages="4" userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Atom/1.46.0 Chrome/69.0.3497.128 Electron/4.2.7 Safari/537.36" editor="www.draw.io"><diagram id="bqxFZxzQZpzVr9IQYmob" name="4 PRE-REQUISITES"></diagram></mxfile>
